subject: Re: Phonak DMC - Virto I-R removal

full_threads.body:
Hi Melinda, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://phonakmarketing.com.au/infinio/
https://phonakmarketing.com.au/phonak-cros-infinio/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi Glen,

Thanks for updating.

Can you please reorder the positioning in the professional brochures for both the Audéo and CROS tiles to have the below items as the first three across the top.

1. Phonak Infinio brochure

2. Phonak Infinio overview portfolio

3. Phonak Infinio overview feature summary



Thanks,

Melinda

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review.

https://phonakmarketing.com.au/infinio/
https://phonakmarketing.com.au/phonak-cros-infinio/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi Glen,

Can you please add the two attached items into the following Infinio tiles under Professional brochure:

Phonak Infinio brochure

028-2689-48

Audéo tile

CROS tile

Add; click to order link

Phonak Infinio overview feature summary

028-2681-48

Audéo tile

CROS tile

Add; click to order link

And add the 'click to order' to the below, in both the Audéo and CROS tiles:

Phonak Infinio over portfolio

028-2674-48

Add; click to order link

Thanks,

Mel.

Hi Glen,

Thanks for updating this.

Thanks,

Melinda

Hi Melinda,
